name: Penny
description: A corky girl who is diligent about her work and curious about everything. "Disassemble first, research later" seems to be her way of expressing interest.

passiveSkill.name: Trembling Tale
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "When Penny appears, the ATK of the 2 Ally partners in hand with the highest Energy increases by {placeholder}, their CRIT Rate increases by {placeholder}, and her own DMG Rate in battle increases by {placeholder}."}

uniqueSkill.name: Chasing Prey
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Bang! Penny attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage."}

specialSkill.name: Execution
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "A blow from behind. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, increasing ATK of the ally with the highest energy in hand by {placeholder} .Chance to use skill: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Hunter
normalSkill.description: Penny goes into a frenzy. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.

templateData.lens4.skill: Bang! Penny attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.
templateData.lens5.skill: When Penny appears, the ATK of the 2 Ally partners in hand with the highest Energy increases by {placeholder}, their CRIT Rate increases by {placeholder}, and her own DMG Rate in battle increases by {placeholder}.
templateData.lens6.skill: A blow from behind. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, increasing ATK of the ally with the highest energy in hand by {placeholder} .Chance to use skill: {placeholder}
